sentences.english: The pickled vegetable of bottled coriander heart is convenient and high quality.
sentences.chinese: 瓶装香菜心酱菜，香味浓郁，脆爽可口，是方便。

sentences.english: Caraway will also assist in the integration of the regeneration hormonal blueprints in ascension.

sentences.english: A spirit distilled from grain or potatoes and flavoured with caraway seeds, among others.
sentences.chinese: 由谷类或马玲薯及香菜种子蒸馏而来。

sentences.english: My mouth is watering looking at the sliced cold chicken with twovanillas.

sentences.english: Remove from heat and add minced cilantro as well seasoning B, then remove to plate and serve.

sentences.english: Some investigators are extending the warning to the herb cilantro as well.

sentences.english: Garnish the pizza with minced cilantro and a squeeze of lime.

sentences.english: Serve garnished with chopped coriander leaf.

sentences.english: Those fearing scurvy might add some chopped parsley too.

sentences.english: Green onion or cilantro can be taken out if you don't like them.

sentences.english: Caraway has a nutty smell and is also an herb useful to digestion.

sentences.english: Add the ham, cook for other 3 min, at last add come chopped parsley.

sentences.english: Freshen Your Breath Parsley6) is a terrific breath reviver.

sentences.english: Caraway reminds initiates to intend a state of prosperity.

definition: enoki mushroom (Flammulina velutipes, Japanese えのき茸 enokitake), used in cuisines of Japan, Korea and China, cultivated to be long, thin and white/abbr. to 金菇
